bean.beanDescription: Our journey began in 2019 with a single cozy coffee shop. Driven by a passion for great coffee, we quickly became a community favorite. Our journey began in 2019 with a single cozy coffee shop. Driven by a passion for great coffee, we quickly became a community favorite. Thanks to our dedication and the support of our wonderful customers, we now proudly operate two thriving coffee shop branches. From one shop to two, our mission remains the same: to serve exceptional coffee and create welcoming spaces. Thank you for being part of our story.

bean.beanName: Beanthere I - Ho Hao Hon Street
bean.beanDescription: Our goal has always been to create a welcoming and serene environment where you can escape the city's noise, enjoy high-quality beverages, and feel right at home - Where we have created a cozy and unique space where the hustle and bustle of the city fades away, and you can enjoy a tranquil garden setting filled with lush greenery.
bean.beanLocation: Address : 42/7 Ho Hao Hon Street District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, VietNam

bean.beanDescription: Our caf√© is designed to offer a serene and inviting atmosphere for all our guests. Whether you prefer the fresh air of our spacious outdoor seating area, surrounded by lush greenery, or the comfort of our stylish indoor space with its modern yet vintage charm, you'll find the perfect spot to relax or get some work done.
bean.beanLocation: Address : 3/5 Hoang Sa District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, VietNam

diy.diyLocation: Available in Beanthere I - Ho Hao Hon Street and Beanthere II - Hoang Sa Street.
diy.diyDescription: A fragrant candle infused with essential oils or aromatic ingredients, designed to create a pleasant and relaxing atmosphere when lit.

diy.diyLocation: Available in Beanthere I - Ho Hao Hon Street and Beanthere II - Hoang Sa Street.

diy.diyLocation: Available in Beanthere I - Ho Hao Hon Street and Beanthere II - Hoang Sa Street.
diy.diyDescription: A creative and customizable tote bag featuring outline designs, perfect for coloring with fabric markers or paints to create a personalized accessory.

diy.diyLocation: Available in Beanthere I - Ho Hao Hon Street and Beanthere II - Hoang Sa Street.
diy.diyDescription: A blank canvas with pre-drawn outlines, ideal for coloring with paints or markers, allowing for a fun and artistic activity to create unique artwork.

diy.diyLocation: Available in Beanthere I - Ho Hao Hon Street and Beanthere II - Hoang Sa Street.
diy.diyDescription: Adhesive bandages with outlined designs that can be colored in with markers or paints, making wound care more fun and personalized.

diy.diyLocation: Available in Beanthere I - Ho Hao Hon Street and Beanthere II - Hoang Sa Street.
diy.diyDescription: A thoughtfully curated set featuring a scented candle, a bar of scented soap, and a heartfelt love letter. The aromatic candle and soap provide a relaxing and luxurious experience, while the love letter adds a personal and romantic touch, making this gift perfect for showing affection and care.

promotions.promotionsDescription: Beanies come from Monday to Thursday at 13PM - 18PM, we will discount for your drink items 10%!
promotions.promotionsLocation: Available in Beanthere I - Ho Hao Hon Street and Beanthere II - Hoang Sa Street.

promotions.promotionsDescription: Happy Pride Month with us! Come and have a relax time, show Beanthere a picture of the post on Facebook, Beanthere will give you 2 cookies!
promotions.promotionsLocation: Available in Beanthere I - Ho Hao Hon Street and Beanthere II - Hoang Sa Street.

drinkdetails.description: A rich and smooth coffee drink, made with a generous amount of cream or milk to achieve a velvety texture and mellow flavor. Iced only.
drinkdetails.included: Double shot of espresso, creamy milk, white milk and condensed milk. Serving in bottle 200ml.

drinkdetails.description: A bold and tropical twist on traditional espresso, topped with a layer of frothy coconut foam for a blend of strong coffee and subtle coconut flavor. Iced only.
drinkdetails.included: Single shot of coffee, coconut foam with coconut water.

drinkdetails.description: A refreshing and exotic drink, featuring a layer of light and airy matcha foam on top of a base made from creamy coconut milk. Iced only.
drinkdetails.included: Coconut water with coconut matcha foam.

drinkdetails.description: A unique and fragrant beverage, combining the subtle sweetness of rice milk with the aromatic and soft texture of pandan-infused tofu. Be able to: Hot or Ice.
drinkdetails.included: Rice milk with topping pandan tofu.

drinkdetails.description: Simple and pure, made from ground coffee beans brewed with hot water, without any additives like milk, sugar, or flavors. Be able to : Ice or Hot.
drinkdetails.included: Double shot of espresso. Optional using with non sugar, white sugar or brown sugar

drinkdetails.description: Rich and sweet, made by mixing brewed coffee with thick, sweetened condensed milk, often served iced. Be able to : Ice or Hot.
drinkdetails.included: Double shot of espresso with condensed milk

drinkdetails.description: A light roast coffee, typically with milk or cream added, resulting in a lighter color and smoother taste. Be able to : Ice or Hot.
drinkdetails.included: Condensed milk, single shot of espresso with white milk

drinkdetails.description: Smooth and creamy, consisting of one or two shots of espresso with a larger amount of steamed milk and a small amount of milk foam. Be able to : Ice or Hot.
drinkdetails.included: White milk, single shot of espresso, optional using with non sugar, white sugar or brown sugar.

drinkdetails.description: A sweet and layered drink with vanilla-flavored syrup, steamed milk, a shot of espresso, and a caramel drizzle on top. Be able to : Ice or Hot.
drinkdetails.included: White milk, single shot of espresso, caramel syrup and Condensed milk.

drinkdetails.description: A chocolate-flavored coffee drink made with espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate syrup or powder, often topped with whipped cream. Be able to : Ice or Hot.
drinkdetails.included: White milk, single shot of espresso, chocolate powder and Condensed milk.

drinkdetails.description: Refreshing and smooth, made by steeping coarse coffee grounds in cold water for an extended period, typically served over ice. Iced only.
drinkdetails.included: With yellow-orange. Serving in bottle 100ml.

drinkdetails.description: A smooth and strong coffee made by diluting a shot or two of espresso with hot water, resulting in a rich flavor similar to traditional drip coffee but with a slightly lighter taste. Be able to: Hot or Ice.
drinkdetails.included: Optional using with non sugar, white sugar or brown sugar

drinkdetails.description: A classic serving of hot tea brewed in a teapot, offering a comforting and aromatic experience with a choice of various tea leaves, such as green and herbal.
drinkdetails.included: Optional using with non sugar, white sugar or brown sugar

drinkdetails.description: A refreshing blend of tea infused with tropical fruits like mango, pineapple, and passion fruit, offering a vibrant and fruity flavor. Iced only.
drinkdetails.included: Topping: Lychee jelly. Optional using with non sugar, white sugar or brown sugar.

drinkdetails.cafeName: Green apple with Acerola cherry Tea
drinkdetails.description: A fruity and tangy tea blend featuring the flavors of crisp apples and sweet cherries, creating a balanced and delightful drink. Iced only.
drinkdetails.included: Topping: Aloe vera. Optional using with non sugar, white sugar or brown sugar.

drinkdetails.description: A refreshing and unique combination of tea infused with the juicy sweetness of watermelon and the subtle floral notes of lychee. Iced only.
drinkdetails.included: Topping: Aloe vera. Optional using with non sugar, white sugar or brown sugar.

drinkdetails.description: A fragrant and sweet tea made with the delicate flavor of lychee fruit, providing a light and floral taste. Iced only.
drinkdetails.included: Topping: Lychee. Optional using with non sugar, white sugar or brown sugar.

drinkdetails.description: A refreshing and tangy fermented tea blend featuring a mix of berries and strawberries, offering a burst of fruity flavors with a slightly tart finish. Iced only.
drinkdetails.included: Serving in bottle 230ml. Kombucha mix between mulberry and strawberry.

drinkdetails.description: A tropical and invigorating kombucha blend combining the sweet and exotic taste of guava with the familiar sweetness of strawberries, resulting in a vibrant and refreshing drink. Iced only.
drinkdetails.included: Serving in bottle 230ml. Kombucha mix between guava and strawberry.

drinkdetails.description: A lively and zesty kombucha made with the distinctively tart and aromatic flavor of passionfruit, delivering a refreshing and invigorating experience. Iced only.
drinkdetails.included: Serving in bottle 230ml. Kombucha passionfruit.

drinkdetails.description: A rich and creamy tea made with strongly brewed black tea, sweetened condensed milk, and spices, known for its vibrant orange-red color and sweet, aromatic flavor. Iced only.
drinkdetails.included: Topping: Grass jelly with White tapioca pearl.

drinkdetails.description: A refreshing and sweet drink made from brewed green tea, sweetened condensed milk, and sometimes a hint of jasmine, resulting in a light green color and smooth, floral taste. Iced only.
drinkdetails.included: Topping: Grass jelly with White tapioca pearl.

drinkdetails.description: A fragrant and delicate milk tea infused with the subtle floral notes of lotus flowers, combined with sweetened milk for a light and soothing beverage. Iced only.
drinkdetails.included: Topping: Grass jelly with White tapioca pearl.

drinkdetails.description: A powerful antioxidant-rich juice blend featuring the tart and vitamin-packed acerola cherries mixed with the sweet and smooth taste of guava, creating a delicious and nutritious beverage. Iced only.
drinkdetails.included: Using non sugar, optional: White sugar.

drinkdetails.description: A tropical and tangy blend combining the aromatic tartness of passionfruit with the sweet and exotic flavor of guava, resulting in a refreshing and vibrant drink. Iced only.
drinkdetails.included: Using non sugar, optional: White sugar.

drinkdetails.description: A unique and invigorating juice combining the earthy sweetness of beetroot, the juicy freshness of watermelon, and the crisp tartness of green apple, offering a flavorful and health-boosting drink. Iced only.
drinkdetails.included: Using non sugar, optional: White sugar.

drinkdetails.description: A creamy and vibrant drink made with finely ground matcha green tea powder, steamed milk, and a touch of sweetness, offering a smooth and earthy flavor with a rich green color. Be able to: Hot or Ice.
drinkdetails.included: Topping: Cold milk-foam.

drinkdetails.description: A rich and indulgent beverage combining espresso with steamed milk and chocolate syrup or cocoa powder, topped with a layer of milk foam, creating a warm and chocolaty treat. Be able to: Hot or Ice.
drinkdetails.included: Topping: Cold milk-foam.

drinkdetails.description: A unique and colorful drink made with finely powdered beetroot, steamed milk, and a hint of sweetener, providing an earthy and slightly sweet flavor with a striking pink hue. Be able to: Hot or Ice.
drinkdetails.included: Topping: Cold milk-foam.
